flawed_nl_solution:
His total expenditure so far is $50+$35+$15 = $<<50+35+15=100>>100
To make a profit of 10%, he has to make a total of $100+($100*(10/100)) = $<<100+(100*(10/100))=130>>130 from sales
To make $130 from the sales of 10 bags, each bag should cost $130/10 = $<<130/10=13>>13
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 130. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
